text: Juan Vital Sourrouille (13 August 1940 - 21 July 2021) was an Argentine economist and politician. Sourrouille was born in Buenos Aires. He was the Minister of Economy of Argentina during the government of Raúl Alfonsín from 1985 until 1989. He created the Austral plan.La era Sourrouille, corazón del Plan Austral Sourrouille died on 21 July 2021 in Buenos Aires from colorectal cancer, aged 80.Murió Juan Vital Sourrouille, el ex ministro de Economía impulsor del Plan Austral ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:Politicians from Buenos Aires Category:Argentine economists Category:Scientists from Buenos Aires
title: Juan Vital Sourrouille
